00001 #ifdef  UTIL_MPI
00002 #ifndef MPI_SEND_RECV_CPP
00003 #define MPI_SEND_RECV_CPP
00004 
00005 #include <string.h>
00006 /*

00012 
00013 #include "MpiSendRecv.h"
00014 
00015 namespace Util
00016 {
00017 
00018    // bool explicit specializations
00019  
00020    template <>
00021    void send<bool>(MPI::Comm& comm, bool& data, int dest, int tag)
00022    { 
00023       int value = data ? 1 : 0;
00024       send<int>(comm, value, dest, tag);
00025    }
00026 
00027    template <>
00028    void recv<bool>(MPI::Comm& comm, bool& data, int source, int tag)
00029    { 
00030       int value;
00031       recv<int>(comm, value, source, tag);
00032       data = value ? true : false;
00033    }
00034 
00035    template <>
00036    void bcast<bool>(MPI::Intracomm& comm, bool& data, int root)
00037    { 
00038       int value;
00039       int rank = comm.Get_rank();
00040       if (rank == root) 
00041          value = data ? 1 : 0;
00042       bcast<int>(comm, value, root);
00043       if (rank != root) 
00044          data = value ? true : false;
00045    }
00046 
00047    // std::string explicit specializations
00048  
00049    template <>
00050    void send<std::string>(MPI::Comm& comm, std::string& data, int dest, int tag)
00051    { 
00052 
00053       // Send size of char C array
00054       int count = data.size() + 1;
00055       send<int>(comm, count, dest, tag);
00056 
00057       // Send string contents as char array
00058       char* cstr = new char[count];
00059       strcpy(cstr, data.c_str());
00060       send<char>(comm, cstr, count, dest, tag); 
00061       delete [] cstr;
00062 
00063    }
00064 
00065    template <>
00066    void recv<std::string>(MPI::Comm& comm, std::string& data, int source, int tag)
00067    { 
00068 
00069       // Receive size of char C array
00070       int  count;
00071       recv<int>(comm, count, source, tag);
00072 
00073       // Receive contents as char C array
00074       char* cstr = new char[count];
00075       recv<char>(comm, cstr, count, source, tag); 
00076       data = cstr;
00077       delete [] cstr;
00078 
00079    }
00080 
00081    template <>
00082    void bcast<std::string>(MPI::Intracomm& comm, std::string& data, int root)
00083    { 
00084       int rank = comm.Get_rank();
00085       int count;
00086 
00087       // Broadcast string count
00088       if (rank == root) 
00089          count = data.size() + 1;
00090       bcast<int>(comm, count, root);
00091 
00092       // Broadcast std::string contents as C string
00093       char* cstr = new char[count];
00094       if (rank == root) 
00095          strcpy(cstr, data.c_str());
00096       bcast<char>(comm, cstr, count, root); 
00097       if (rank != root) 
00098          data = cstr;
00099       delete [] cstr;
00100 
00101    }
00102 
00103 }

00105 #endif
